00052 #include "generic/Logger.hpp"
00053 
00054 namespace youbot {
00055   
00056   bool Logger::toConsole = true;
00057   bool Logger::toFile = false;
00058   severity_level Logger::logginLevel = info;
00059 
00060   Logger::Logger(const std::string &funcName, const int &lineNo, const std::string &fileName, severity_level level) {
00061 
00062     if (toConsole || toFile) {
00063       if (level >= logginLevel) {
00064         print = true;
00065 
00066         switch (level) {
00067           case trace:
00068             out << "Trace" << ": ";
00069             break;
00070           case debug:
00071             out << "Debug" << ": ";
00072             break;
00073           case info:
00074             out << "Info" << ": ";
00075             break;
00076           case warning:
00077             out << "Warning" << ": ";
00078             break;
00079           case error:
00080             out << "Error" << ": ";
00081             break;
00082           case fatal:
00083             out << "Fatal" << ": ";
00084             break;
00085           default:
00086             break;
00087         }
00088         //  out << "function " << funcName << ": ";
00089         //  out << "line " << lineNo << ": ";
00090         //  out << "fileName " << fileName << ": ";
00091         //  out << "time " << boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::local_time() << ": ";
00092       } else {
00093         print = false;
00094       }
00095     } else {
00096       print = false;
00097     }
00098 
00099   }
00100 
00101 
00102   Logger::~Logger() {
00103     //end of message
00104     if (toConsole && print) {
00105       std::cout << out.str() << std::endl;
00106     }
00107 
00108     if (toFile && print) {
00109       std::fstream filestr;
00110       filestr.open("log.txt", std::fstream::out | std::fstream::app);
00111       filestr << out.str() << std::endl;
00112       filestr.close();
00113     }
00114   }
00115 
00116 } // namespace youbot
